ðŸš€ reticulum-meshchat | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Off-grid and decentralized communication using mesh networks.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Sending and receiving messages, files, and audio calls â€¢ Communication over Ethernet, WiFi, internet, and LoRa radio â€¢ Secure communication with message encryption â€¢ Compatibility with LXMF clients (Sideband, Nomadnet)
ðŸ“– Summary: Reticulum MeshChat is a simple mesh network communications application built on the Reticulum Network Stack. It allows users to send messages, files, and audio calls over various interfaces, including local networks, the internet, and LoRa radio, with a focus on secure communication and compatibility with other LXMF clients like Sideband and Nomadnet.

âœ¨ vt-cli | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Interacting with the VirusTotal service via the command line for security analysis and threat intelligence.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Retrieve information about files, URLs, domain names, and IP addresses â€¢ Search for files and URLs using VirusTotal Intelligence query syntax â€¢ Download files â€¢ Manage LiveHunt YARA rules â€¢ Launch Retrohunt jobs and get their results
ðŸ“– Summary: The VirusTotal CLI is a command-line tool that allows users to interact with the VirusTotal API. It provides functionalities such as retrieving information about files, URLs, domains, and IP addresses, as well as searching for threats, downloading files, and managing LiveHunt YARA rules.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ AgentGym-RL | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Training LLM agents for long-horizon decision-making tasks through reinforcement learning.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Multi-turn interactive decision-making â€¢ Support for real-world scenarios â€¢ Compatibility with mainstream RL algorithms â€¢ ScalingInter-RL algorithm for optimization stability â€¢ Visualized interactive user interface for data analysis
ðŸ“– Summary: AgentGym-RL is a framework for training LLM agents to perform multi-turn interactive decision-making using reinforcement learning. It provides diverse real-world scenarios and supports mainstream RL algorithms, aiming to improve the performance of LLM agents in complex tasks.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ obsidian-telegram-sync | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Transferring and organizing Telegram messages and files within an Obsidian vault for note-taking and knowledge management.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Synchronize text messages and files â€¢ Save messages as individual notes or append to an existing note â€¢ Transcript voices and video notes (for Telegram Premium subscribers only) â€¢ Use customizable templates for new notes â€¢ Set folders for new notes and files
ðŸ“– Summary: The Obsidian Telegram Sync plugin allows users to transfer messages and files from Telegram to their Obsidian vault. It supports saving text, voice transcripts, images, and other files, enabling further processing and organization of Telegram content within Obsidian.
